text: Cun az u noumed sudand, ʙaroi masvarat ʙa kanore raftand va ʙuzurgtarinason guft: «Ojo namedoned, ki padaraton az sumo ʙa nomi Xudo pajmon girifta va pes az in niz dar haqqi Jusuf kutohi kardaed? Man az in sarzamin ʙerun nameojam, to padar maro ruxsat dihad jo Xudo dar ʙorai man dovari kunad, ki U ʙehtarini dovaron ast
